ModMetaData.name: Posthuman Drift: Titan Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Xylthixlm
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Titan xenotype and associated genes.\n\nThese stony giants are grown in vats for one purpose: to build things that will outlast them. Towering and near-impervious, they work without pause in places that would kill most people: burning deserts, frozen tundras, poisonous wastelands. They don’t talk much, don’t reflect much, and don’t seem to care. Walls go up, fire burns, storms howl—and the Titans keep working.
